scripts.binary:ios: npm run construir:web-prod && ionic cordova platform rm ios && ionic cordova platform add ios && node --max_old_space_size=4096 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng run app:ionic-cordova-build --platform=ios
scripts.config:files: sed -i 's/node: false/node: { crypto: true, stream: true }/g' node_modules/@angular-devkit/build-angular/src/angular-cli-files/models/webpack-configs/browser.js
scripts.actualizar:dependencias: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json plugins/ platforms/ && npm install -d && npm run npm:audit:update
scripts.simulador:ios:dev: npm run platforms:remove && npm run construir:web-dev && ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova platform add ios
scripts.simulador:ios:cert: npm run platforms:remove && npm run construir:web-cert && npm run platforms:ios:prepare
scripts.simulador:ios:preprod: npm run platforms:remove && npm run construir:web-preprod && npm run platforms:ios:prepare
scripts.simulador:ios:prod: npm run platforms:remove && npm run construir:web-prod && npm run platforms:ios:prepare
scripts.platforms:ios:prepare: ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova platform add ios && node --max_old_space_size=4096 node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng run app:ionic-cordova-build --platform=ios
scripts.platforms:remove: ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova platform rm android --save && ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova platform rm ios --save && ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova platform rm browser --save && rm -rf plugins/
scripts.files:dev: cp src/environments/environment.dev.ts src/environments/environment.ts && cp docs/firebase/dev/* ./ && npm run config:files
scripts.files:cert: cp src/environments/environment.cert.ts src/environments/environment.ts && cp docs/firebase/cert/* ./ && npm run config:files
scripts.files:preprod: cp src/environments/environment.preprod.ts src/environments/environment.ts && cp docs/firebase/preprod/* ./ && npm run config:files
scripts.files:prod: cp src/environments/environment.prod.ts src/environments/environment.ts && cp docs/firebase/prod/* ./ && npm run config:files
scripts.construir:web-dev: rm -rf www/ && npm run remove:files && npm run files:dev && npm run build
scripts.construir:web-cert: rm -rf www/ && npm run remove:files && npm run files:cert && npm run build
scripts.construir:web-preprod: rm -rf www/ && npm run remove:files && npm run files:preprod && npm run build:prod
scripts.construir:web-prod: rm -rf www/ && npm run remove:files && npm run files:prod && npm run build:prod
scripts.desarrollar:dev: npm run remove:files && npm run files:dev && ./node_modules/.bin/ng serve
scripts.desarrollar:cert: npm run remove:files && npm run files:cert && ./node_modules/.bin/ng serve
scripts.desarrollar:preprod: npm run remove:files && npm run files:preprod && ./node_modules/.bin/ng serve --prod
scripts.desarrollar:prod: npm run remove:files && npm run files:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/ng serve --prod
scripts.start:browser: ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova platform add browser && ./node_modules/.bin/ionic cordova run browser

cordova-plugin-geolocation.GEOLOCATION_USAGE_DESCRIPTION: Necesitamos su ubicaci칩n geogr치fica para mostrarle los servicios y/o afiliados disponibles que esten cercanos a su localidad actual
